overview: The theme of the film is the love story triggered by the spirit of Wulan Muqi riding on the roots of grassroots and serving the people. It tells the story of Wu Zhumuqin Wulan Muqi female singer Sara and the grassland lovers who created music. The love story between luns born by songs, divided by songs, and combined by songs.
title: The Love Song of the Ujimqin
